name: ventai-app
description: VentAI - Professional HVAC Calculation and Design Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python src/fastapi_app/main.py
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m flake8 src && python -m black --check src && python -m isort --check src
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m black src && python -m isort src

author: VentAI Team
